痓字的基本解释

痓
zhì
痉挛：“发喉痹，嗌肿，痓，治主病者。”
中医病症名：“肺移热于肾，传为柔痓。”

痓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》充自切，去至，昌。］
风病。指筋脉拘挛强直一类病症。

痓字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痓； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页773第05
【唐韻】充自切【集韻】充至切，?音厠。【博雅】痓，惡也。【集韻】一曰風病。【正字通】痓證有五，秦越人難經，督脈為病，脊强而厥。張仲景金匱：脊强者，五痓之總名，其證卒口噤，背反張而瘈瘲。　又山名。【山海經】大荒之中有山，名曰去痓。

痓字的起名意思

暂无。

痓
Basic explanation of words
痓
zhì
Spasm: "Those who have numbness of the throat, swelling, and rash, cure the main disease."
The name of the TCM disease: "The lung transfers heat to the kidneys, and it spreads as soft rash."
痓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guangyun" is full of self-cutting, going to the end, prospering. ]
Wind disease. Refers to a type of disease such as tendons and veins, spasm and rigidity.
痓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痓; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 773 05
【Tang Yun】Fully self-cutting 【Jiyun】Fully-cutting, sound toilet. 【Bo Ya】Urban, evil too. [Jiyun] Firstly, wind disease. [Zhengzitong] There are five urinary syndromes. Qin and Yue people have difficulty in menstruation, the governor channel is sick, and the spine is strong and faint. Zhang Zhongjing's Golden Chamber: The strong spine, the general name of the five carbuncle, his card died and his mouth was silent, the back was Zhang and the carbuncle.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Shanhaijing】There are mountains in the great wilderness, and the name is to go to the rash.
